description: The scathing House Ethics Committee report released Monday caps off one of the most extensive investigations into former Rep. Matt Gaetz’s (R-Fla.) conduct, headlined by findings that Gaetz paid a 17-year-old high school student for sex and used illicit drugs like cocaine and ecstasy. The report accuses Gaetz of misusing his office to dispense a…
title: Four highlights from the scathing Gaetz Ethics report

description: Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) Administrator Michael Regan will leave the Biden administration at the end of this year — about a month before the presidency changes hands. While Regan could serve until Trump’s inauguration, he notified staff on Friday he will leave a few weeks early. “Today, I am writing to let you know that…
title: EPA Administrator Michael Regan to depart at year’s end

description: Greenland’s prime minister said on Monday that the autonomous island is not for sale after President-elect Trump said owning Greenland “is an absolute necessity” for the U.S. “Greenland is ours. We are not for sale and will never be for sale,” Prime Minister Múte Egede said in a statement, according to reports from BBC and…
title: Greenland to Trump: We’re not for sale

description: Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy have proposed the creation of a Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) to cut the federal government down to size, while Michael Mandel and Diana Carew have proposed a Regulatory Improvement Commission (RIC) to review and simplify existing regulations.
title: ‘Sup, DOGE! You should meet RIC, the Regulatory Improvement Commission.

description: Remembering that history makes the peaceful transfer of power that Biden is promising seems less a rote exercise than a commitment that must be revived after every election and celebrated whenever it occurs.
title: The peaceful transfer of power is rarer than Americans might think

description: Former Rep. Matt Gaetz (R-Fla.) openly floated the idea of running for Sen. Marco Rubio’s (R-Fla.) Senate seat during a Turning Point USA event in Arizona on Sunday. “Many have asked which perch I will be fighting from next, and some of you throughout this conference have even given me a few suggestions,” Gaetz said…
title: Gaetz floats possible bid for Rubio’s Senate seat

description: President Biden gave commutations of sentences to 37 people on federal death row Monday. Those who received the Monday commutations of their sentences saw them go from execution to life with no possibility of parole. However, three “hard cases” were not among the commutations. Biden, while announcing the commutations, said that he is “more convinced…
title: These 3 federal death row inmates were not on Biden’s commutation list

description: A group of conservatives, led by a group formed by former Vice President Mike Pence, wrote to the top Republican on the powerful Ways and Means Committee on Monday urging him to slash the corporate tax rate and eliminate capital gains taxes on inflation. Nearly 40 conservatives, most of whom lead think tanks and policy…
title: Conservatives urge Ways and Means GOP to cut corporate rate, capital gains tax

description: It took Assad’s regime to fall and Putin to accept it meekly for the West to appreciate that things weren’t all that rosy in Tsar Vladimir’s rotting kingdom.
title: The fall of Assad is an ‘emperor has no clothes’ moment for Putin

description: Sen. Tom Cotton (R-Ark.) bashed President Biden’s decision to commute the sentences of 37 of 40 individuals on federal death row, calling the move “politically convenient.” “Once again, Democrats side with depraved criminals over their victims, public order, and common decency,” Cotton said on X. The senator added, “Democrats can’t even defend Biden’s outrageous decision…
title: Cotton rips Biden’s death row commutations as ‘politically convenient’

description: 174 people were rescued by ski patrol after a gondola malfunction at Winter Park Resort, and the gondola was closed for repairs and inspections until Monday.
title: Colorado ski resort rescues 174 from gondola mishap

description: Donald Trump is set to launch an all-out attack on federal regulations, including those that protect public health and safety, environmental quality and climate stability.
title: Can America decarbonize without regulations? Under Trump, it will have to.
